name: Åmazon
description:
Team: Diversion, Vindrue, and DoomMeow.

This school project for 18/09/2022 was designed to spread awareness about the ocean's pollution. The game was made by three students from Next Sukkertoppen during the DDU pilot project.

Tools used: Unity Game Engine, Github, and Aseprite.

Audio:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5uSKe49aUtg&ab_channel=Repulsive-Topic
